org.ensembl.variation.driver
Interface AlleleGroupAdaptor

All Superinterfaces:
Adaptor, java.rmi.Remote
public interface AlleleGroupAdaptor
extends Adaptor

Retrieves Allele groups from an ensembl database.

Author:
Craig Melsopp
